column4: Hi. I'm using Kubuntu Edgy Eft AMD64 version, and with new repositories added (suggested by unofficial ubuntu guide at http://ubuntuguide.org/wiki/Ubuntu:Edgy) I cannot install "w32codecs" package with "sudo apt-get install w32codecs" , it reports something about not being able to find it or it is obsoleted!? Can someone please tell me how to install "w32codecs" package?
Title Search: "mediubuntu" results of about 18014 pages. (0.36 seconds)
go to https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RestrictedFormats there is a link to proper page
